name: Symbaroum Macros - English
description: This contains useful macros for use with the Symbaroum system.

macros.name: Pay for re-roll
macros.author: YsmQXJ6sqv5HM9Ov

macros.name: Alternate Damage

macros.name: CRB Character Importer

macros.name: Reset Temporary Corruption
macros.author: YsmQXJ6sqv5HM9Ov

macros.name: Add Exp
macros.author: YsmQXJ6sqv5HM9Ov
macros.command:
/** 
 * Macro can be used by either selecting tokens on-screen or, if no tokens are selected, choosing which player characters (default all)
 * 
 */
game.symbaroum.macros.addExp()
